item.title: Car dealership outages drag on after CDK cyberattacks

item.description:
Car dealerships and auto shops around the U.S. enter a second week of disruption following cyberattacks at software maker CDK.

item.title: Matt Rogers, Nest and Mill co-founder, talks mastering consumer tech at Disrupt 2024
item.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
item.description:
Consumer technology is hard, but few people have mastered it as well as Matt Rogers, co-founder of Nest and now Mill, his new startup that promises to turn your table scraps into planet-saving treasure. Mill burst out of the gate last year after spending some time in stealth refining its waste bin, an easy to […]

item.title: Google is bringing Gemini access to teens using their school accounts
item.dc:creator: Aisha Malik
item.description:
Google announced on Monday that it’s bringing its AI technology Gemini to teen students using their school accounts, after having already offered Gemini to teens using their personal accounts. The company is also giving educators access to new tools alongside this release. Google says that giving teens access to Gemini, can help prepare them with the […]

item.title: Target and Shopify team up to expand Target’s third-party marketplace
item.dc:creator: Lauren Forristal
item.description:
Shopify merchants can now sell their items to Target’s millions of shoppers, thanks to a new partnership. The companies announced on Monday that sellers on the commerce platform can apply to join Target Plus, the retail giant’s third-party marketplace where merchants can sell and manage orders. Target is the first major retailer to collaborate with […]

item.title: Apple’s App Store breaches EU’s Digital Markets Act
item.dc:creator: Romain Dillet
item.description:
A few months after opening a non-compliance case on Apple and the Digital Markets Act (DMA), the European Commission has shared its preliminary findings with Apple. And the bottom line is that the current App Store rules are in breach of the DMA. Confirmed violations of the DMA can lead to fines of up to […]

item.title: Meta makes its AI chatbot available to all users in India
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description:
After a few months of testing during the general elections, Meta is making its Llama-3-powered AI chatbot available to all users in India. However, Meta AI currently only supports English and no other local languages. The company started testing Meta AI in India across WhatsApp, Instagram, Messenger, and Facebook in April by rolling it out […]

item.title: Streaming execs think TV’s future looks a lot like its past
item.dc:creator: Anthony Ha
item.description:
We’re at a transitional moment in streaming — user growth is slowing and major players are looking to consolidate, but the long-promised dream of profitability finally seems within reach (especially if you’re Netflix). The perfect time, then, for The New York Times to interview many of the industry’s big names — including Netflix co-CEO Ted […]
